title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When I select the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu in TH, nothing happens.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' action should add Javadoc to the selected field in TH.
SR: Steps to reproduce:  1. Open TH. 2. Right-click on a field. 3. Select 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu.
